name: BusinessDayConvention
definition: convention that enumerates the possible ways to handle a date that falls on a weekend or holiday
label: business day convention

name: Convention
label: convention
definition: widely accepted or established way of doing 'something' within some community of practice

name: BusinessDayAdjustment
definition: convention that specifies what happens when a date falls on a day that is a weekend or a holiday in one or more business centers
label: business day adjustment

name: DayOfWeek
definition: specific, recurring day of the week
label: day of the week

name: BusinessRecurrenceInterval
label: business recurrence interval
definition: recurrence interval that is defined per a specific convention that determines how recurring days should be handled

name: EndOfMonth
label: end of the month
definition: the last day of a calendar month, irrespective of the length of the calendar month

name: BusinessRecurrenceIntervalConvention
definition: convention that specifies how recurring days should be handled, such as the end of the month, a particular day of the month, a day of the week, or more specifically, a t-bill auction date
label: business recurrence interval convention

name: DayOfMonth
label: day of month
definition: specific, recurring day of the month

name: BusinessDayModifiedPreceding
definition: convention specifying that a non-business date will be adjusted to the first preceding day that is a business day unless that day falls in the previous month, in which case that date will be the first following day that is a business day
label: business day modified preceding

name: hasBusinessDayConvention
label: has business day convention
definition: identifies a convention regarding how a date should be handled when it falls on a day that is not a business day

name: BusinessDayPreceding
label: business day preceding
definition: convention specifying that a date will be adjusted to the first previous day that is a business day

name: BusinessDayNearest
definition: convention specifying that a non-business date will be adjusted to the nearest day that is a business day -- i.e. if the non-business day falls on any day other than a Sunday or a Monday, it will be the first preceding day that is a business day, and will be the first following business day if it falls on a Sunday or a Monday
label: business day nearest

name: BusinessDayFollowing
label: business day following
definition: convention specifying that a non-business date will be adjusted to the first following day that is a business day

name: BusinessDayNone
label: business day none
definition: convention specifying that a date will not be adjusted if it falls on a day that is not a business day

name: hasBusinessRecurrenceIntervalConvention
label: has business recurrence interval convention
definition: identifies a convention regarding how certain recurring dates should be handled with respect to a given schedule, such as the end of the month

name: hasBusinessDayAdjustment
definition: identifies a convention for adjustment of the business day for handling weekends and holidays
label: has business day adjustment

name: BusinessDayModifiedFollowing
definition: convention specifying that a non-business date will be adjusted to the first following day that is a business day unless that day falls in the next calendar month, in which case that date will be the first preceding day that is a calendar date
label: business day modified following
